docs.lead_paragraph: The nonpartisan office says that lawmakers are focused on the wrong kind of spending and that annual deficits will begin rising in 2016 as baby boomers age.

headline.main: Budget Office Warns That Deficits Will Rise Again Because Cuts Are Misdirected
headline.print_headline: Budget Office Warns That Deficits Will Rise Again Because Cuts Are Misdirected

docs.abstract: Nonpartisan Congressional Budget Office warns that Pres Obama and lawmakers have been cutting the wrong kind of federal spending as they try to avoid the unsustainable buildup of debt that is projected in the coming decades.
docs.snippet: The nonpartisan office says that lawmakers are focused on the wrong kind of spending and that annual deficits will begin rising in 2016 as baby boomers age.

docs.lead_paragraph: Almost two million home care workers will now be covered by the Fair Labor Standards Act, but the change will not go into effect until 2015.

headline.main: U.S. to Include Home Care Aides in Wage and Overtime Law
headline.print_headline: Wage Law Will Cover Home Aides

docs.abstract: Obama administration announces it is extending minimum wage and overtime protections to nation's nearly two million home care workers; they will now be covered by Fair Labor Standards Act, but change will not go into effect until 2015.
docs.snippet: Almost two million home care workers will now be covered by the Fair Labor Standards Act, but the change will not go into effect until 2015.

docs.lead_paragraph: A new vaccine tested in monkeys generated a muted immune response that effectively wiped out cells infected with simian immunodeficiency virus, a close relative of H.I.V.
docs.abstract: Dr Louis J Picker study in journal Nature reports that vaccine developed by Picker and tested in monkeys generates muted immune response that has been shown to effectively wipe out cells infected with simian immunodeficiency virus, close relative of HIV.
docs.snippet: A new vaccine tested in monkeys generated a muted immune response that effectively wiped out cells infected with simian immunodeficiency virus, a close relative of H.I.V.
